title: Higher ping all of a sudden after patch 6.14
body: So i lately got pings around 200-400 i dont know how but i usually have ping around 30-50 which is great after 6.14 i got the high ping first few days of the patch was normal ping then it was high how can i fix this ??? my internet is fine its riots fault for this shit

replies.body: Ping or lag spikes issues are usually due to an unstable connection issue with a network trying to reach our game servers, and not necessarily the result of patching game files.  I recommend running our[ log reade](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)r to help get an overview of what's going wrong.  The results will also provide a series of steps that can be taken to resolve this.  Let me know how that works for you!
